_source.short_desc: Run your pharmacy business smoothly,download the free trail to experience the software using your live data
_source.long_desc: GOFRUGAL Technologies have been providing pharma software for the past 15 years and caters to all the needs of pharmacy from invoice entry,inventory management, expiry management, sales bill,reordering,scheduled drug index, and helps pharmacies run their businesses smoothly. GOFRUGAL POS can also integrate with e-commerce solution that allows customers to manage in-store and online inventory from a single platform. GOFRUGAL POS have business apps, personalised on-boarding and 24/7 support.
_source.target_audience: Serving digital retailers & restaurateurs across US, UK, CA, India, Australia and over 60+ countries

related_products.short_desc: Cerner Ambulatory supports more than 55 specialties by delivering integrated clinical and financial solutions and services.
related_products.features: Cerner's PowerChart Ambulatory EHR ensures the right clinicians have the right information at the right time and place to make the best possible decisions. We believe that with information technology and coordination, health care becomes safer, more effective and available to communities worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: Datascan has supported the unique needs of Independent Pharmacy since 1981. Before you make any decisions, contact us!
related_products.features: Since 1981, Datascan has been the pioneer of the pharmacy software industry. Our cutting edge software is designed to streamline pharmacy workflow while building profits, efficiency, and patient adherence. Our boutique style service allows our clients to have a voice and helps to build a better product everyday. Many of our features are included for free. Why? Because your success is our number one priority! Give us 15 minutes to tell you why Datascan is the best choice for your pharmacy!

related_products.short_desc: A unified commerce solution (ERP + POS) for retail and hospitality built on Microsoft dynamics technology
related_products.features:
A dispensing, retail software & ERP that covers all daily pharmacy routines and operations in one single software solution. 

Ideal for pharmacies with 50+ employees or pharmacy chains.

Manage prescriptions, handle drugs effectively and keep track of the levels of pharmaceutical stock across all stores. At the same time, you can also handle retail items (including pricing, replenishment, campaigns/promotions, loyalty, etc.) manage appointments and reservations, and finalize sales at the POS.

related_products.short_desc: VIP Pharmacy Systems provides comprehensive Pharmacy, LTC, and POS management software with immediate and personal customer support.

Visit our website to find out how VIP can help you build a better pharmacy!

Speed Script knows that our customers need a technology provider who understands and anticipates the challenges of running a pharmacy.  Our customers value our dedication to providing remarkable live support and services.

related_products.short_desc: Quick startup of a complete pharmacy management solution.  Easy to use workflow, seamless integration, and powerful lookup capability.

Use your own equipment for a zero-cost startup with our cloud-based solution.  The best pharmacy system for your business is Pharmacy Systems.

similar_products.features:
For nearly 40 years, BestRx has remained a family business committed to providing independent pharmacies with the tools needed to operate more efficiently and profitably.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Hospital Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospital Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospital Management software automates processes including billing, appointments, scheduling, regulatory compliance and financial auditing within hospitals. These applications offer integration across the financial, clinical, and operational elements of a healthcare practice and enable users to optimize their office workflow and reduce their operational expenses. Hospital Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software, .

Quickly browse through hundreds of Long Term Care tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Long Term Care software automates the operations of nursing homes and long term care facilities. Managers use Long Term Care applications to improve the efficiency and accuracy of their administrative functions. Long Term Care software offers a variety of flexible features which assist in the management and organization of patient records, billing and invoicing and staff and appointment scheduling. Long Term Care software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software and Medical Billing software.

related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.
